page.title: 07FASHION IN 1985
page.content: The accent is very much on leisure gear for both sexes, and features lightweight, light coloured comfortable clothing. For girls, "flower-power" or floral blouses which tie at the waist are extremely popular. Teamed with floral patterned trousers, fall-down socks and soft ankle boots or low heeled shoes. The fashionable young lady of 1985 completes her outfit by wearing butterfly clips in her hair, purple eye shadow and dark lipstick. Earrings are still more popular with girls and range from novelty types to as many as seven in one ear! Boys too have a wide choice in fashion. Jogging or track suits are popular, as are sweat shirts, T-shirts, "baggies", "cords" or stone-washed jeans. White ankle socks and soft leather boots or trainers complete the outfit.
